articles.title: Vanderbilt's Kicker Stunt With Sarah Fuller Was A Step Back For Female Athletes - The Federalist
articles.description: Everyone in the situation, from Vanderbilt to ESPN, stood to gain brownie points for being pro-woman. And they got them. But at what cost?
articles.content: I religiously follow college football and have since I was young. In addition to my love for watching the game, I also played as the first and only girl in my 6th-grade football league. While my foot… [+6427 chars]

articles.title: Tom Brady says he has a 'great relationship' with Bruce Arians despite frequent call-outs - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Tom Brady simply refuses to criticize his head coach, even though his head coach has been publicly criticizing him.
